attributes.review: This app is not it. I downloaded it onto my iPhone and every time it asked me if I wanted it to have my location, and I said no, it would still be on in settings and I couldn't turn it off. The same thing happened when they asked me anything else like if I wanted notifications. Also, it wouldn't let me move it around the screen or delete it. That's right I couldn't delete it. Now it's stuck on my phone and I dont even like Trump, I just wanted to see what all the fuss was about.
attributes.title: Ew.

attributes.review: Does good necessarily follow good intentions? Barry B. Benson (Jerry Seinfeld), a bee who's just finished his education and hates the idea of picking a life-long vocation, meets a human, florist Vanessa Bloome (Renée Zellweger), while buzzing about Manhattan. She takes him to a supermarket where Barry discovers shelves and shelves of honey. Realizing it has been taken from bees - who work tirelessly and exhaust themselves for their two cups a year - he follows the delivery truck back to the honey farm, gathers evidence, and files suit against humanity. But what if Barry wins and the honey is returned to the bees, who can then slack off? An ecological cataclysm?
attributes.title: Initially hopeful

attributes.review:
It’s slow, the pages don’t work, it’s takes up battery, it’s not well organized and sometimes it will only give me a blank screen. Do not download this!!! Your phone will be bombarded with trump ads and it will slow you’re data!!! I opened it and I saw trump! How despicable.

(You can’t stop us, we were raised off of books showing dystopian worlds and the young rising up to stop it, don’t be suprised when we follow in their footsteps)

attributes.title: delete yourself 😋🍊

attributes.review: I didn’t even know this app existed so I downloaded it. This app is just the worst. It spammed my notifications and I’m pretty sure it found my location. It keeps wanting me to vote for this orange man but I forgot his name. He kinda looks like he smells like beans so I decided to delete the app. Getting this app is the worst decision you’ll ever make. Don’t get it please it will find your location and make you smell like beans. It happened to me. 0/10 experienced would not recommend. don’t smell like beans guys.
attributes.title: tiny orange in his pants

attributes.review: I got this app strictly to educate myself on Trumps plans for the upcoming election and to be better committed to being part of his army of supporters. But, as I began searching through the app it became very difficult to find any credible information. I had very high hopes for the app as it is rated highly in the news section of the App Store. But, after further research I wouldn’t even recommend this app to my worst enemy. It has no credible information and is extremely difficult to navigate.
attributes.title: disappointed.

attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app but what happened when I downloaded it was just awful. First it took literally forever to download and then after a day of using it a picture of Dr. Phill naked riding a goat kept consuming my screen when I would go on the app. Apart from the vile things showing up when I go into this app, it deleted most of my data after it hacked me. This is an outrage and if apple knew what was good for them they would remove this app promptly!
attributes.title: This app ruined my phone!!!!!!!
